tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE cryptocurrency_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_address VARCHAR(255),
    recipient_address VARCHAR(255),
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(18,2),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    is_suspicious BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE cryptocurrency_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    sender_address TEXT,
    receiver_address TEXT,
    amount DECIMAL(18,8)
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_metadata (
    metadata_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id UUID,
    metadata_key TEXT,
    metadata_value TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES cryptocurrency_transactions(transaction_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_hash VARCHAR(255),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    sender_wallet_address VARCHAR(255),
    receiver_wallet_address VARCHAR(255),
    amount DECIMAL(18,2)
)

CREATE TABLE Users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    full_name VARCHAR(100),
    registration_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE ComplianceStatus (
    status_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    status_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE cryptocurrency_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    sender_address VARCHAR(255),
    receiver_address VARCHAR(255),
    amount DECIMAL(18, 2),
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE cryptocurrency_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_address VARCHAR(255),
    receiver_address VARCHAR(255),
    amount DECIMAL(18, 8),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_details (
    detail_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INT,
    currency VARCHAR(10),
    status VARCHAR(20),
    FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES cryptocurrency_transactions(transaction_id)
);

CREATE TABLE regulatory_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INT,
    compliance_score DECIMAL(5, 2),
    risk_level VARCHAR(20),
    FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES cryptocurrency_transactions(transaction_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ai_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    data_id INT,
    classification VARCHAR(50),
    confidence DECIMAL(5, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (data_id) REFERENCES regulatory_data(data_id)
);
